languages.text: "Какой... чистый цвет. Никогда не видела ничего подобного! Глубокое спокойствие, укутанное в бело-голубой саван. Единство мысли и духа... Мертвецы не способны источать подобных оттенков".
"Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."
languages.original_text: "Какой... чистый цвет. Никогда не видела ничего подобного! Глубокое спокойствие, укутанное в бело-голубой саван. Единство мысли и духа... Мертвецы не способны источать подобных оттенков".

traits.locale_text: "Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! This deep calm wrapped in a shroud of white-blue. This unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."
"Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! This deep calm wrapped in a shroud of white-blue. This unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."
"Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquility shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."
"Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquility shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."
"Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."
"Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."

languages.text: "Diese ... Reinheit der Farbe. So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen! Tiefe Ruhe in einer kühl-weißen Wolke. Welch Einheit von Gedanken und Geist ... Die Toten können derlei Farbtöne nicht ausstrahlen."
languages.original_text: "Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."

traits.locale_text: "Diese ... Reinheit der Farbe. So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen! Tiefe Ruhe in einer kühl-weißen Wolke. Welch Einheit von Gedanken und Geist ... Die Toten können derlei Farbtöne nicht ausstrahlen."

languages.text: « Une telle... pureté dans les couleurs. Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel ! Une profonde tranquillité, enveloppée dans un nuage blanc de fraîcheur. Une remarquable unité de pensée et d'esprit... Les morts ne produisent jamais ce genre de nuances. »
languages.original_text: "Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."

traits.locale_text: « Une telle... pureté dans les couleurs. Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel ! Une profonde tranquillité, enveloppée dans un nuage blanc de fraîcheur. Une remarquable unité de pensée et d'esprit... Les morts ne produisent jamais ce genre de nuances. »

languages.text: “如此……纯净的色彩，我以前从来没见过！深邃的宁静笼罩在冷白色的云层中，如此统一的思想与精神……死人是无法发出这样的色彩的。”
languages.original_text: "Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."

traits.locale_text: “如此……纯净的色彩，我以前从来没见过！深邃的宁静笼罩在冷白色的云层中，如此统一的思想与精神……死人是无法发出这样的色彩的。”

languages.text: 「なんと…純粋な色なのでしょう。このようなものは見たことがありません！純白の雲に覆われた深い平穏。思考と魂の高度な結合…死者にはこのような色を放出することはできません」
languages.original_text: "Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."

traits.locale_text: 「なんと…純粋な色なのでしょう。このようなものは見たことがありません！純白の雲に覆われた深い平穏。思考と魂の高度な結合…死者にはこのような色を放出することはできません」

languages.text: «Qué color tan puro... ¡Nunca había visto nada igual! Una profunda tranquilidad envuelta en una fría nube blanca. Fusiona mente con espíritu... Los muertos no presentan esta gama de tonos».
languages.original_text: "Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."

traits.locale_text: «Qué color tan puro... ¡Nunca había visto nada igual! Una profunda tranquilidad envuelta en una fría nube blanca. Fusiona mente con espíritu... Los muertos no presentan esta gama de tonos».

languages.text: "Renkler... Nasıl da saflar. Gözüme böylesi hiç ilişmemişti! Bu derin sükûnet hâli, âdeta maviye çalan beyaz bir bulutla örtülmüş. Düşünce ile ruhun bu denli iç içe geçmesi... Ölüler, böylesi renk tonları yaymaktan yoksundur."
languages.original_text: "Such... purity of colour. I have never seen anything like it! Deep tranquillity shrouded in a cool-white cloud. Such unity of thought and spirit... The dead are incapable of exuding such hues."

traits.locale_text: "Renkler... Nasıl da saflar. Gözüme böylesi hiç ilişmemişti! Bu derin sükûnet hâli, âdeta maviye çalan beyaz bir bulutla örtülmüş. Düşünce ile ruhun bu denli iç içe geçmesi... Ölüler, böylesi renk tonları yaymaktan yoksundur."
